Sta. SEN.17: Senegal, N side of Cape Verde Peninsula, La Calao. Protected bay with sand, stones and boulders, w of little, rocky peninsula ans facing Ile de N'Gor, depth to 4 m. Snorkeling. 28, 30.xi and 1.xii.1983.
